entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-249}{F813,1,417007}Huh? Have we met before...? Do you know{F801}what "Naraku" is...?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-249}{F813,1,417007}Huh? Have we met before...? Do you know{F801}what "Naraku" is...?{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-249}I knew it. Listen, mister...{F801}{F802}{F813,1,417009}Some angels suddenly came out and{F801}started killing all the demons in the{F801}Eastern Kingdom of Mikado.{F801}{F802}{F812}Demon\0{F87A,-249}They're doing it just 'cause they're{F801}demons! I'm so scared... I don't wanna{F801}go back to Naraku...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-249}I knew it. I'm so scared... I don't wanna{F801}go back to Naraku...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Demon\0{F87A,-237}I knew it. I'm a former human. You're{F801}"in the know" like me, huh?{F801}{F802}The Eastern Kingdom of Mikado right now{F801}is so boring, with the angels and all,{F801}huh?{F801}{F802}Tokyo's the place to be. Everyone's{F801}desires run wild there... I ain't going{F801}back!{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Hunter man\0{F87A,119}{F813,1,403042}Dang... Someone else other than me has{F801}narrowed it down? Then the rumors must{F801}be true...{F801}{F802}The ones about that Fiend sighting at{F801}Minami Sunamachi, I mean.{F801}
